title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Go-based tool to pull, build, and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API with sync & async clients for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components with standard LangChain interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured, self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server; chat, generate, pull, and manage models idiomatically.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI that wraps ollama-js to chat, generate, and list models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Terminal UI inspired by OpenAI Codex that uses local Ollama models for inline code generation and refactoring.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation repo showing how to combine Ollama embeddings & generation with Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate exposing typed APIs for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management via reqwest.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models into Discord servers with slash commands, conversation memory, and role-based access.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines to test prompts or generate code docs without GPUs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that uses the Python client to talk to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping ollama-js for dependency-injected chat and generation services with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin enabling inline LLM prompts via Ollama to summarize notes, brainstorm, or rewrite text blocks.
